abstract: A $5 student ticket to the L.S.U. game can be worth hundreds. Some will not give up the chance to witness the big game.
snippet: A $5 student ticket to the L.S.U. game can be worth hundreds. Some will not give up the chance to witness the big game.

headline.main: Postcard From Alabama: The Choice: Memories Or Cash
headline.print_headline: Postcard From Alabama: A Choice: Memories or Cash
